title: Choose Our Future
desc: A web application developed as part of my senior capstone. Over the course of a year, I worked with 6 other students as well as UCAR to make a digital version of one of their exhibits. The application explores how everyday choices add up to make your carbon footprint, and what the effect would be on the climate if everybody acted the same way as you in the future.

title: History Through Battleship
desc: A full stack application developed for one of my courses at CU Boulder. I worked alongside 4 other students over the course of a semester to create a trivia based battleship game. It functions similarly to a regular game of the board game Battleship, but adds a trivia component when trying to sink a ship.

title: Endless Picross
desc: An android game that generates random picross puzzles. Unlike other picross puzzle applications, the puzzles are randomly generated.

title: Triadic Color Generator
desc: An single page iOS app to calculate a triadic color palette from either an rgb slider input or a hex value.
